word_mean: 锗：稀有元素，具有蓝灰色类金属外观，原子序数32，原子量72.59，符号Ge

sentence.Network_en: Until today germanium is the present substance on earth with no exception.
sentence.Network_cn: 直至今天锗才毫无异议地成为地球上是纯净的物质.

sentence.Network_en: Apart from selenium and vapour - deposited germanium and silicon, glasses are at least diatomic.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了硒和汽相沉积的锗和硅之外, 玻璃至少是二原子的.

sentence.Network_en: Doped silicon and germanium are technologically the most important types of semiconducting material.
sentence.Network_cn: 添加硅和锗在工艺上是半导体物质中最重要的类型.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 锗（Germanium）是一种天然矿物，在人体内有改变生物反应的功能，可以改变身体对肿瘤的反应，办法是将额外份量的氧气送入每 …
1.有机锗(Germanium)：能脱氢，可调整血液不正常之酸碱值，使血液携氧量大幅增加，改善机体缺氧现象；可平衡人体内之生理电位…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Latin Germanus (see German)

means.word_mean: 1. a brittle gray crystalline element that is a semiconducting metalloid (resembling silicon) used in transistors; occurs in germanite and argyrodite

auth_sentence.content: "You can imagine staying with fairly traditional transistors, moving to silicon-germanium, then III-V structures," Fuller said.
